name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Fullstack Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience, I specialize in leveraging **AWS** services such as **Lambda**, **API Gateway**, **S3**, **EventBridge**, **RDS**, **DynamoDB**, and utilization of **AWS CDK**, **CloudFormation**, and **Terraform** to build high-performance applications. My solid expertise in **Node.js**, and **TypeScript** allows me to create robust applications with seamless functionality.
I also have a strong foundation in integrating **AI** solutions, focusing on **LLM design**, model evaluation, and working with tools like **Langfuse**. My full-stack development experience covers modern frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, alongside back-end technologies like **FastAPI** and **Django**.
Additionally, I bring extensive experience in cloud architecture across **Azure** and **AWS**, leading the development of enterprise-grade platforms that incorporate AI and ML capabilities for intelligent automation and real-time data processing. With a commitment to implementing microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, I ensure that all applications are robust, secure, and compliant with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.

Conducted regular performance evaluations and audits of deployed models and APIs to maintain and improve systems' efficiency, security, and compliance with regulatory standards.

Designed responsive front-end applications using **React 18**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, achieving cross-platform compatibility and improved UI engagement metrics by **40%**.
Implemented real-time functionalities utilizing **WebSockets** and event-driven architectures with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ**, resulting in enhanced order tracking and real-time updates for users.
